comments:
On 20.10.1844 the parish of Careghofa was transferred from Denbighshire 
    to Montgomeryshire.

Abolished 1894 to become the separate parishes of Guilsfield Without 
    and Guilsfield Within. See also Table 2, note (a).

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Guilsfield in Welshpool 
    Municipal Borough. See also Table 2, note (d).
Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Guilsfield.
Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of Llanfihangel.

On 24.3.1887 the part in Denbighshire  became 
    part of the parish of Llanrhaiadr ym Mochnant North, so that thereafter Pennant 
    was entirely in Montgomeryshire.
